channel.title: First post Pl0xer / Dannyskape fullscreen and hd ready D claws hand cannon
channel.description:
[img]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/7007/mybanner4b40a2a2f1e3b.png[/img]
Welcome on my first post
my new scape build by me and dannyskape.
*
Pictures
Clan wars
[img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/177/castlewarsd.png[/img]
Corporeal beast
[img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/7881/corporealbeast.png[/img]
Danger pk
[img]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/3339/dangerpk.png[/img]
Dragon claws special
[img]http://img682.imageshack.us/img682/3738/dragonclawsspecial.png[/img]
Edgevillage pvp
[img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/3573/edgevillagepk.png[/img]
Ice barrage w/o staff
[img]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/4092/firstofguthix.png[/img]
Ge system with help !
[img]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/6843/fullgrandexchangesystem.png[/img]
Login screen
[img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/3808/fullscreeng.png[/img]
Fun dragon pk
[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/9626/fundragpk.png[/img]
Fun pk box
[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/9657/funpkbox.png[/img]
Home
[img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/6660/homejl.png[/img]
Lumbritche pk
[img]http://img682.imageshack.us/img682/5710/lumbritchepvp.png[/img]
Prayer 1
[img]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/5672/prayer5.png[/img]
Staffzone
[img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/5378/staffzone.png[/img]
Tormented demon
[img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/1911/tormenteddemon.png[/img]
Varrock pvp
[img]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/6762/varrockpvp.png[/img]
Features
----------------- Working Magic w/o staff 100% Dragon claws special 100% Ags special 100% Hand cannon special 100% Bgs special 100% Zaradomin gs spec 100% Vengeance 99% Rune c'bow e bolts 100% Dark bow special 100% And much more specs 100% All prayers working 100% ---------------------------- Ge system 80% Banking 95% You can only bank if you do not resize. Weapon bonus 100% Full screen modus 100% Hd modus 100% Npc vs player 100% player vs player 100% Castle wars 100% First of guthix 100% Clan wars 90% Pvp 100% Tormented demon shield 100% Cororeal beast 100% Clan chat 80% Mage w/ staff 100% Tormented Demons Corporal Beast PvP drops Bork and ork legions All weapons with right anims Ranged on npc Almost every special on npc's Banking NPC drops Slayer tower with Abby Demons FullScreen HD/LD Full working Hand cannon with special All working 100% Head Icon prayers work perfect Animations work perfect Working Lunar/Ancient magic Friend list Pming Interfaces Resizable and Fixed ------------------- Ban 100% Mute 100% ipban 300%
Credits Me 55% Dannyskape owner 45%
Enjoy my first post the source can be download at the link
